name: Cathay Pacific Business Class - The Good & The Not So Good
description:
This business clas flight review features Cathay Pacific Boeing 777 and Airbus A330 aircraft flying from London Heathrow to Hong Kong and onto Adelaide, Australia. 

The flight review covers check-in and lounge at Heathrow, boarding, take off and the Cathay Business Class seat which converts into a fully flat bed.  I also cover Cathay Pacific's inflight service, ammenities kit, entertainment system and on-board dining. 

Lounges featured include the American Airlines Lounge at London Heathrow Terminal 3 and the Cathay Pacific First Class Lounge and Business Class Lounge at Hong Kong Airport.   

I hope you enjoy this flight review - if you would like to see more please visit and subscribe to my channel DennisBunnik Travels. 

Happy Flying!
